trends: There has been one other sighting in Hancock
There were no other sightings in Hancock on or around September 28th 2012
divs: sighting detailsseptember 28th, 8:30pm houghton, michigan - walking dog after dinner at nara nature center - spotted series of 10 ufos appearing in groups of 3-3-2 flying in straight line and triangle formation - rising from northwestern horizon, flying east under cloud cover - starlike in appearance but slightly larger, orange glow - thought it was a satellite at first but too low, cloudy sky, and then multiple objects appeared - maintained consistent direction with slight wiggle\variation, appeared slow moving - each one slowly faded\pulsated until disappeared from sight - felt curious, perplexed
Summary: {nd} 10 UFOs total in groups of 3-3-2, rising from northwestern horizon, flying east under cloud cover, starlike, orange glow, slowly faded/pulsated until disappeared from sight
